pilot.translate: пилот, летчик, лоцман, контрольный, пробный, пилотировать, вести
examples: The pilot flew to Cuba
The pilot was wearing a parachute.
Our pilot was taken prisoner.
He served as a pilot during the war.
a pilot for a new sitcom
This pilot works the controls.
The pilot got clearance to land.
The pilot managed to land the aircraft safely.
a student pilot's first solo flight
The pilot climbed into the cockpit.
He is learning how to pilot a helicopter.
I finally qualified as a pilot.
a pilot grounded by health problems
He wrote about his experiences as a pilot.
The crash was blamed on pilot error.
The pilot managed to land the airplane safely.
The stunt pilot looped his plane.
The pilot had to bank the aircraft.
The group conducted a pilot program.
The pilot gave the order to bomb up.
The pilot made contact with the base.
The pilot has logged 1200 flying hours.
The pilot managed to pinpoint the factory.
The pilot radioed in to the control tower.
The pilot brought the plane back on course.
a daredevil test pilot having the right stuff
Nearsightedness is a bar to becoming a pilot.
The pilot retracted the plane's landing gear.
The pilot ran through the check-out procedure.
The pilot scheme proved to be a great success.
example_translate: Наш летчик был взят в плен.
Во время войны он служил лётчиком.
пилот, отстранённый от полётов из-за проблем со здоровьем
Он писал о своём опыте работы в качестве пилота.
На счету этого пилота 1200 летных часов.
Лётчику удалось нанести точный удар по заводу.
Пилот заставил самолёт вернуться на курс.
безрассудный лётчик-испытатель, обладающий всем, чтобы добиться успеха
